amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following: SEC.___. None of the funds appropriated or otherwise made available by this Act may be obligated or expended to carry out any activities under the United States-Afghanistan Strategic Partnership Agreement, signed on May 2, 2012, except for such activities authorized by Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 48 printed in House Report 113-170 to restrict the use of funds approved by this Act from being used to carry out activities under the United States-Afghanistan Strategic Partnership Agreement, without being approved by Members of Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jones amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 246 (Roll no. 401).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jones amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 246 (Roll no. 401).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Jones.
